subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Michel Platini, the former France player and now president of European soccer’s governing body, is leading an attempt to bypass European labor law to stop teams spending what they want on the players they want.
snippet: Michel Platini, the former France player and now president of European soccer’s governing body, is leading an attempt to bypass European labor law to stop teams spending what they want on the players they want.
